1.「おおーい メーデ。村人名簿の古いやつを| どこに しまったか 覚えておるか？: Hey, Medde. Do you remember where you put the|Old Villager List?

2.「あら？ ５０年以上前の 古いものは| だいぶ前に 捨てませんでしたー？: Oh, no? Didn't we throw out the old ones, the|ones over 50 years old, a long time ago?

3.「そうだった！ ヒューザのやつに| 捨てにいかせたのを 忘れとったぞ。: That's right! I forgot that I sent Hyuza's guy|to dump it.

4.<pipipi_low>「ふむ……。この事件の手がかりは| 村長により 闇に葬ら:
Hmmm... the clue to this case was|about to be buried in the dark by the village|head. Still, I don't think the village chief|
|is the culprit...

5.「おお ルベカちゃん。探偵ごっこかね。: Oh, Rubecca. Playing detective, are you?

6.<pipipi_low>「お父さ……セトリー村長。| その村人名簿を どこに捨て: <pipipi_low> Father...Chief Setorii. Will you|tell me where you dumped that Villager list?

7.「う～ん。たしか ヒューザが| レーナム緑野にある 忘却のほら穴に| 出かけると: Hmmm. I think Hyuza told me to throw it away|on my way out to the Forgetten Cave in Lenam|Fields...

8.<pipipi_low>「……う～む なるほど。| そういうことか。: <pipipi_low>...hmmm I see. So that's how it|is.

I have a theory that the|surprisingly law-abiding Hyuza did as he was|told and dumped the Villager list in that|
|cave!

11.<pipipi_low>「聞いていたかね <pc>くん。| ダーリア事件の 重要: <pipipi_low>Did you hear that <pc>? I|just found out that an important clue in the|Dahlia case is lying dormant in a cave!

12.<pipipi_low>「ここからは 助手の仕事だ。| アタマを使うのは私。肉体: <pipipi_low>This is where my assistant comes|in. I do the thinking. You do the physical|labor. This is the most efficient way.

13.<pipipi_low>「私は ここで待っている。| レーナム緑野にある 忘却の: <pipipi_low>I'll be waiting here. Go and|search the depths of the Forgetten Cave in|Lenam Fields.

14.魔物が 地面から 何かを掘りだしたようだ。: The monster seems to have dug something out of|the ground.

18.「ダーリアさんの名前を 見つけた！| 花婿のレグさんも いっしょに載ってるわ。: I found Dahlia's name! And Reg, the groom, is|on the list too.

19.「ふたりの関係は 夫婦って書かれてる。| つまりこれは 結婚式の直前に作られた|: Their relationship is listed as husband and|wife. So it's safe to say that this is a list|of names made just before the wedding.

21.「ほら ここんとこ。| ひとりだけ 名前が消されてるみたい。: You see, these days. It looks like one|person's name has been erased.

22.「名前の他は 残ってるね。えっと……。| 性別は……女で 年齢は……１０歳。: The rest of your name is still here. Well...|her gender is... female, and her age is... 10.

25.「あっ ぼーっとして ごめんね。| お……おかげで 重要な手がかりが| 見つかっ: Oh, sorry for spacing out. Thanks to you, I|think I found an important clue.

26.「でも この続きは また今度にしたいの。| 今日は ここで終わりね！: But I'd like to continue this another time.|That's it for today!

27.「私の助手を やってくれて ありがとう。| お礼に これを もらってくれる？: Thank you for being my assistant. Can I have|this as a thank you?

28.「そ……それじゃ しばらくしたら また来て。| <pc>のこと 待ってるから。: Well then, come back in a while. I'll be|waiting for <pc>.
